name: agent
content:
<situation name="{SITNAME}" mapAllAttributes="Y">
      <class name="{EIF_CLASS}" />
      <slot slotName="msg">
        <literalString value="Log Agent Error Code : $KLO_PRO_PERFORMANCE_OBJECT_STATUS.Error_Code$" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="object_status">
        <mappedAttribute name="KLO_PRO_PERFORMANCE_OBJECT_STATUS.Object_Status" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="query_name">
        <mappedAttribute name="KLO_PRO_PERFORMANCE_OBJECT_STATUS.Query_Name" />
      </slot>
      <slot slotName="profile">
        <literalString value="gti_rhb_base" />
      </slot>
    </situation>
